name: Type3 Design File
summary: Learn about .VND files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Dassault Systemes CATIA with Type3 add-on

content: VND design files can be loaded and processed by 2D and 3D cutting, engraving, and modeling equipment.

description: Native design format of the Type3 Artistic Software family; used by Vision Numeric's TypeEdit and the Type3 CATIA add-on; contains CAD/CAM designs that may include text, shapes, and other types of paths.
